item.title: Workstation
item.description: Not everyone needs a maxed out battle-station for the occasional meeting or e-mail reading at home. For those who don’t intend to work from home every day or won’t be sitting all of their 9-to-5, dialing down a bit can save some space and visuals. Chair A bright, half-height and semi-transparent chair (like the Herman Miller Setu) is great for not filling too much the field of vision. Unfortunately most good looking and ergonomic desk chairs have a 5 wheels “star” base - which is understandable because mobility is very functional at the office.
